AlreadyInitialized().details: Emitted when attempting to initialize an already initialized or locked contract.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

previewSettlementResults((address,addres.details: WARNING: If the same user appears multiple times in the batch,      only the first occurrence will show accurate preview results.      Subsequent occurrences will use stale balance/nonce values since      this is a view function that cannot simulate state changes.      For accurate preview of batches with duplicate users, call this      function separately for each unique user.

params.settlements: Array of settlement data to preview

returns.failedUsers: Array of user addresses that failed validation
returns.failureReasons: Array of failure reasons corresponding to failedUsers
returns.partialAmounts: Array of unsettled amounts corresponding to partialUsers
returns.partialUsers: Array of user addresses with insufficient balance

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

settleFeesWithTEE((address,address,uint2.details: Status codes: 0=SUCCESS, 1=PARTIAL_SETTLEMENT, 2=PROVIDER_MISMATCH, 3=NO_TEE_SIGNER, 4=INVALID_NONCE, 5=INVALID_SIGNATUREStatuses array has same length as input, with statuses[i] corresponding to settlements[i]All settlement details are emitted via TEESettlementResult events

params.settlements: Array of settlement data to process

returns.statuses: Array of settlement statuses (uint8), preserving one-to-one correspondence with input

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

previewSettlementResults((address,addres.notice: Preview settlement results for a batch of settlements without state changes

settleFeesWithTEE((address,address,uint2.notice: Settle fees with TEE-signed settlement data
